title: Full Stack Developer
description: At LegrandAV, I am part of the customer experience team to develop and maintain legrandav.com and other digital experience applications. I am responsible for architecting front-end solutions and developing end to end components. Also, I am part of the AI Team which was formed in Legrand. I was part of the team that build different AI use case solutions for our internal divisions.

title: Junior Full Stack Developer
description: I was part of the technical team at GAA. I was responsible for designing and developing the WISE-R product which I built with cloud computing and SPA's. I also designed the customer experience
